original_solution_mapping.L1: After losing one of the pages you have 12 - 1 = <<12-1=11>>11 pages of stickers.
original_solution_mapping.L2: If each page has 20 stickers on it, you have 11 x 20 = <<11*20=220>>220 stickers.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4342.
    Returns: the total number of stickers after losing one page.
    """
    # L1
    total_pages = 12 # 12 pages of stickers
    lost_pages = 1 # lose one of the pages
    remaining_pages = total_pages - lost_pages

    # L2
    stickers_per_page = 20 # 20 stickers on a page
    total_stickers = remaining_pages * stickers_per_page

    # FA
    answer = total_stickers
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: After losing one of the pages you have {total_pages} - {lost_pages} = <<{total_pages}-{lost_pages}={remaining_pages}>>{remaining_pages} pages of stickers.
If each page has {stickers_per_page} stickers on it, you have {remaining_pages} x {stickers_per_page} = <<{remaining_pages}*{stickers_per_page}={total_stickers}>>{total_stickers} stickers.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: After losing one of the pages you have 12 - 1 = <<12-1=13>>13 pages of stickers.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: If each page has 20 stickers on it, you have 13 x 20 = <<13*20=260>>260 stickers.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.
